law.catch_line: The incorporators shall sign and acknowledge two copies of articles of incorporation....

text.section: The incorporators shall sign and acknowledge two copies of articles of incorporation.

The articles of incorporation may include:
Any provision that requires for any purpose the concurrence of a greater proportion of the votes of all classes or of any class of capital stock than the proportion required by this article for that purpose; and
Any provision that defines, limits, or denies the preemptive rights of stockholders to acquire additional stock of the State bank or trust company.
